Class OAImagePanelController

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.jfc.editor.image.control.OAImagePanelController

public class OAImagePanelController
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for OAImagePanel and image components. Adds toolbar commands, etc.

getBufferedImage

public java.awt.Image getBufferedImage()
Returns the current buffered image, which is he original image plus changes made to it. The changes are not yet part of the original image.

See Also:
isImageChanged()

isImageChanged

public boolean isImageChanged()
Returns true if the buffered image has changes that are not saved to image.
